actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of a potential resource development.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility studies of the Versippi unit, Heart division, Pick- Sloan Missouri Basin program, Stark and Dunn Counties, North Dakota, as a potential water resource development.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of a potential resource development.
